mutants.code:
def calculate_max_child_height_sum(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, A, B) = case
        oa = []
        ea = []
        ob = []
        eb = []
        for i in range(N):
            if A[i] % 2:
                oa.append(A[i])
            else:
                ea.append(A[i])
            if B[i] % 2:
                ob.append(B[i])
            else:
                eb.append(B[i])
        oa.sort()
        ea.sort()
        ob.sort()
        eb.sort()
        new_a = oa - ea
        new_b = ob + eb
        ans = 0
        for i in range(N):
            ans += (new_a[i] + new_b[i]) // 2
        results.append(ans)
    return results
